Detailed Description

Declare strings to hold system version numbers.

Author:
Alexios
This simple header file only declares symbols to hold version information on when the Megistos libraries were built.



 *****************************************************************************\
 **                                                                         **
 **  FILE:     systemversion.h                                              **
